content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Cary uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex response to the changing seasons.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Cary uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex response to the changing seasons.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
